com.kingcore.framework.util
类 CookieUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.kingcore.framework.util.CookieUtils

public class CookieUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains a number of static methods that can be used to work with javax.servlet.Cookie objects.

版本：
1.0
作者：
Hans Bergsten, Gefion software

构造函数详细信息

CookieUtils

方法详细信息

getCookieValue

public static java.lang.String getCookieValue(java.lang.String name,
                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
                                       throws org.apache.commons.codec.DecoderException
Returns the value of the Cookie with the specified name, or null of not found. 根据请求找到请求cookie中名称为name 的cookie 值。 对cookie值做了Base64解码。

参数：
name - cookie's name.
req - response Object.
返回：
抛出：
org.apache.commons.codec.DecoderException

getCookieValue

public static java.lang.String getCookieValue(java.lang.String name,
                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                              boolean needDecode)
                                       throws org.apache.commons.codec.DecoderException
Returns the value of the Cookie with the specified name, or null of not found. 根据请求找到请求cookie中名称为name 的cookie 值。

参数：
name - cookie's name.
req - response Object.
needEncode - 是否需要对Cookie值解码，默认true.
返回：
抛出：
org.apache.commons.codec.DecoderException

sendCookie

public static void sendCookie(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String value,
                              int maxAge,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
Creates a Cookie with the specified name, value and max age, and adds it to the response. 添加cookies 并且默认对cookie值做了Base64 编码。

参数：
name - cookie's name.
value - cookie's value.
maxAge - the time cookie been keeped. the unit is second. age of the cookie in seconds,负数表示关闭浏览器即删除Cookie. an integer specifying the maximum age of the cookie in seconds; if negative, means the cookie is not stored; if zero, deletes the cookie.
res - response Object.

sendCookie

public static void sendCookie(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String value,
                              int maxAge,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                              boolean needEncode)
Creates a Cookie with the specified name, value and max age, and adds it to the response. 添加cookies 对cookie值做了Base64 编码。

参数：
name - cookie's name.
value - cookie's value.
maxAge - the time cookie been keeped. the unit is second. age of the cookie in seconds,负数表示关闭浏览器即删除Cookie. an integer specifying the maximum age of the cookie in seconds; if negative, means the cookie is not stored; if zero, deletes the cookie.
res - response Object.
needEncode - 是否需要对Cookie值做Base64编码，默认true

sendCookie

public static void sendCookie(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String value,
                              int maxAge,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                              boolean needEncode,
                              java.lang.String domain)
Creates a Cookie with the specified name, value and max age, and adds it to the response. 添加cookies 对cookie值做了Base64 编码。 The form of the domain name is specified by RFC 2109. A domain name begins with a dot (.foo.com) and means that the cookie is visible to servers in a specified Domain Name System (DNS) zone (for example, www.foo.com, but not a.b.foo.com). By default, cookies are only returned to the server that sent them.

参数：
name - cookie's name.
value - cookie's value.
maxAge - the time cookie been keeped. the unit is second. age of the cookie in seconds,负数表示关闭浏览器即删除Cookie. an integer specifying the maximum age of the cookie in seconds; if negative, means the cookie is not stored; if zero, deletes the cookie.
res - response Object.
needEncode - 是否需要对Cookie值做Base64编码，默认true
domain - Cookie's domain

clearCookie

public static void clearCookie(java.lang.String name,
                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
不带 domain 的clearCookie。 clear a cookie from client side.

参数：
name - the name of cookie will be cleared.
response - HttpServletResponse Object.

clearCookie

public static void clearCookie(java.lang.String name,
                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                               java.lang.String domain)
带有 domain 的clearCookie。 The form of the domain name is specified by RFC 2109. A domain name begins with a dot (.foo.com) and means that the cookie is visible to servers in a specified Domain Name System (DNS) zone (for example, www.foo.com, but not a.b.foo.com). By default, cookies are only returned to the server that sent them.

参数：
name - 需要清除Cookie的名字
response - 响应对象
domain - 在指定域清除Cookie，如果不指定则默认为当前域

clearCookie

public static void clearCookie(java.lang.String name,
                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                               java.lang.String domain,
                               java.lang.String path)
带有 domain,path 参数的 clearCookie。 The form of the domain name is specified by RFC 2109. A domain name begins with a dot (.foo.com) and means that the cookie is visible to servers in a specified Domain Name System (DNS) zone (for example, www.foo.com, but not a.b.foo.com). By default, cookies are only returned to the server that sent them.

参数：
name - 需要清除Cookie的名字
response - 响应对象
domain - 在指定域清除Cookie，如果不指定则默认为当前域
path - 在指定目录清除Cookie，如果不指定则默认为根目录

isCookieSet

public static boolean isCookieSet(java.lang.String name,
                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
Returns true if a cookie with the specified name is present in the request. 判断是否有名称为name 的cookie， 对cooki值编码没有要求。

参数：
name - the name of the cookie will be checked.
req - response Object.
返回：
